snippet: The Russian leader reappeared in public after more than 10 days, appearing healthy and commenting wryly that things “would be boring without rumors.”
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin makes first public appearance in 10 days, dismissing dramatic rumors that surrounded his mysterious absence, but offering little explanation.
lead_paragraph: The Russian leader reappeared in public after more than 10 days, appearing healthy and commenting wryly that things “would be boring without rumors.”

headline.main: Putin Returns After Curious Absence and Shrugs Off Rumors
headline.print_headline: Putin Returns After Curious Absence and Shrugs Off Rumors
